annotations.description: We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. The superiority of the away team was evident on the pitch today. The hosts defended well and were deadly on the counter attack. The away side displayed some nice build up play using a lot of passes.

We are watching a run of the mill game with only a few moments to ignite the crowd. The players surely can surely perform better, they just need to motivate themselves. The away team tries to prevail using combination football.

Good touch by Sergio Busquets (Barcelona) as he receives a great pass and attempts to threaten the goalkeeper with his long range strike. Unfortunately for him, the effort misses the net and flies well wide to the right. The ball goes out of play and Atl. Madrid will have a goal kick.

Hello and welcome to our minute by minute commentary of the upcoming clash. We will try to provide you with as accurate as possible picture of the happenings on the pitch. Have fun.

We were witnesses to an uneventful game without many stirring moments. There is definitely room for improvement in future games. The superiority of the away team was evident on the pitch today. The hosts defended well and were deadly on the counter attack. The away side displayed some nice build up play using a lot of passes.
